sentences.sContent: Jack and Helen had dropped behind in order to be alone.
sentences.sCn: 为了单独呆在一起，杰克和海伦故意让别人走在前面。

sentences.sContent: He polished off his work in order to see his girlfriend.
sentences.sCn: 为了去见女朋友，他匆忙地做完手头的工作。

sentences.sContent: She decathected from him in order to cope with his impending bankruptcy.
sentences.sCn: 为了对付他的即将来临的破产，她不再依恋他。

trans.tranOther: with the purpose or intention of doing or achieving sth
